question: Show jazz bands and rock bands founded in 1970.
sql_query1:
SELECT Jazz_Bands.band
FROM Jazz_Bands
WHERE Jazz_Bands.Founding_Year = 1970
UNION
SELECT Rock_Bands.band
FROM Rock_Bands
WHERE Rock_Bands.Founding_Year = 1970
sql_query2:
SELECT Jazz_Bands.band
FROM Jazz_Bands
UNION
SELECT Rock_Bands.band
FROM Rock_Bands
WHERE Rock_Bands.Founding_Year = 1970
interpretation1: Which jazz bands are founded in 1970 and which rock bands are founded in the same year?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all jazz bands and also provide a list of rock bands founded in 1970.
